text: Prostitute () is a 1927 Soviet silent drama movie directed by Oleg Frelikh.В Локарно слушают песни о ЛенинеПРОСТИТУТКА (1926) It stars Olga Bonus, Mark Donskoy, and L. Krasina. == Actors == * Olga Bonus as Aunt Varvara (as O. Bonus) * Mark Donskoy * L. Krasina * Ivan Lagutin as Vasiliy Dmitrich (as I. Lagutin) * Aleksandr Ledashchev == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Soviet silent movies Category:1927 movies
title: Prostitute (1927 movie)
